name: Sigewinne
desc:
"Wondrous Dragonheir" Sigewinne

"Pure spirit, heed my wish."

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Create 1 <color=#ffffff>Large Bolstering Bubblebalm</color> and insert as the third card from the top of your deck. This character gains 3 stacks of <color=#ffffff>Bond of Life</color> . (After the <color=#ffffff>Large Bolstering Bubblebalm</color> effect is triggered, create a <color=#ffffff>Medium Bolstering Bubblebalm</color> and place in your opponent's deck. After the <color=#ffffff>Medium Bolstering Bubblebalm</color> effect is triggered, create a <color=#ffffff>Small Bolstering Bubblebalm</color> and place in your deck.)
<color=#ece5d8>Bond of Life</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached is healed:</color> This effect will be consumed once for every <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> it has to negate 1 HP of healing received. (Cannot negate revives or healing caused by redistribution of HP)
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack, no stack limit).

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 2 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> , then performs " <color=#ffffff>Prepare Skill</color> " for <color=#ffffff>Medical Intervention of Pure Intention</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Medical Intervention of Pure Intention</color>
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 2 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> .

<color=#ffd780>Passive</color>
(Passive) When your character is healed, after causing the <color=#ffffff>Bond of Life</color> attached to them to be completely removed, this character gains 1 extra Max HP. (Up to 3 times per character)
<color=#ffffff>When you switch to this character:</color> If your side has <color=#ffffff>Sourcewater Droplet</color> , -1 to their <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> , and this character gains 1 <color=#ffffff>Energy</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Bond of Life</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached is healed:</color> This effect will be consumed once for every <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> it has to negate 1 HP of healing received. (Cannot negate revives or healing caused by redistribution of HP)
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack, no stack limit).
<color=#ece5d8>Sourcewater Droplet</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After Neuvillette uses a Normal Attack:</color> Heals the character for 2 HP. After this, <color=#ffffff>Prepare Skill</color> : <color=#ffffff>Equitable Judgment</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack. Max 3 stacks.)

<color=#ffd780>Event Card</color>
<color=#ffffff>When this card is drawn:</color> Heal your active character for 3 HP. Create 1 <color=#ffffff>Medium Bolstering Bubblebalm</color> and insert it as the second card from the top of your opponent's deck.

<color=#ffd780>Event Card</color>
<color=#ffffff>When this card is drawn:</color> Deals 2 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> to the active character on the side of the field this card is on. Create 1 <color=#ffffff>Small Bolstering Bubblebalm</color> and place it at the top of your opponent's deck.

<color=#ffd780>Event Card</color>
<color=#ffffff>When this card is drawn:</color> Heal all your characters for 1 HP. Create <color=#ffffff>Sourcewater Droplet</color> .

Applies Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>] Frozen</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives +2 Physical or Pyro DMG)
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Bloom</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Dendro Core</color> ] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Prepare Skill</color>
Some Skills cannot be used directly. Instead, they need to be <color=#ffffff>prepared</color> over a certain number of turns.
When it is a certain player's turn, and this player's active character is currently <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> a Skill, this player's turn will be skipped. If the Skill has finished being <color=#ffffff>prepared</color> , the character will directly use that Skill at this time. (Skills that require <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> cannot activate effects triggered by "using a Skill" or "triggering an Elemental Reaction" or other such effects.)
Only active characters can <color=#ffffff>prepare</color> Skills, and if an active character who is <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> a Skill gets switched off-field, their <color=#ffffff>preparation</color> will be interrupted.
<color=#ece5d8>Energy</color>
Characters must consume Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.
When characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 Energy.

value.name: Requires Appropriate Rest
value.desc:
Sigewinne: Requires Appropriate Rest

"Don't be nervous! Just relax."

value.text: Reward for inviting Sigewinne to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Sigewinne
value.desc: A Melusine and the Fortress of Meropide's head nurse. She cares equally for every convict locked in the undersea prison.

customize.name: Sigewinne
customize.desc:
"Wondrous Dragonheir" Sigewinne

"Pure spirit, heed my wish."

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Playing cards with a carefree mindset does wonders for your mood!"
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Sigewinne's deck centers around Healing and Bond of Life. Once she heals your characters and clears Bond of Life, your characters will gain a boost to their Max HP.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Sigewinne
customize.desc:
"Wondrous Dragonheir" Sigewinne

"Pure spirit, heed my wish."

customize.name: Qiqi
customize.desc:
"Icy Resurrection" Qiqi

Circulating endlessly, life goes on.

customize.name: Neuvillette
customize.desc:
"Ordainer of Inexorable Judgment" Neuvillette

He who looks down on all that are haughty.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Requires Appropriate Rest
customize.desc:
Sigewinne: Requires Appropriate Rest

"Don't be nervous! Just relax."

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Wow, you're amazing! If you get the chance, you wouldn't be able to stop by the Fortress of Meropide for a game of cards with me and my patients, would you?"
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Sigewinne" starts with the Talent Card "Requires Appropriate Rest" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.
